QueryDefinition.Query:
with Additional_upd as ( SELECT [patid] ,[enttype] ,[adid] ,case when ABS(data1) - FLOOR(ABS(data1))=000 then cast(cast(data1 as int) as varchar(256)) else cast(data1 as varchar(256)) end as data1 ,case when ABS(data2) - FLOOR(ABS(data2))=000 then cast(cast(data2 as int) as varchar(256)) else cast(data2 as varchar(256)) end as data2 ,case when ABS(data3) - FLOOR(ABS(data3))=000 then cast(cast(data3 as int) as varchar(256)) else cast(data3 as varchar(256)) end as data3 ,case when ABS(data4) - FLOOR(ABS(data4))=000 then cast(cast(data4 as int) as varchar(256)) else cast(data4 as varchar(256)) end as data4 ,case when ABS(data5) - FLOOR(ABS(data5))=000 then cast(cast(data5 as int) as varchar(256)) else cast(data5 as varchar(256)) end as data5 ,case when ABS(data6) - FLOOR(ABS(data6))=000 then cast(cast(data6 as int) as varchar(256)) else cast(data6 as varchar(256)) end as data6 ,case when ABS(data7) - FLOOR(ABS(data7))=000 then cast(cast(data7 as int) as varchar(256)) else cast(data7 as varchar(256)) end as data7
FROM [Additional] JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND patid = ch.PERSON_ID ), a as ( select a.patid, a.adid, cast(a.enttype as varchar(20)) +'-' + '1' as observation_source_value, case when l1.code is null and data1lkup is null then cast(a.data1 as varchar(256)) when data1lkup = 'GEN_SDC' and cast(a.data1 as varchar) not in ('0', '2', '3') then cast(dateadd(d,-cast(a.data1 as int)- 10 ,'12-31-2014') as varchar(256)) when data1lkup = 'Medical Dictionary' then cast(m.description as varchar(256)) when data1lkup = 'Product Dictionary' then cast(p.productname as varchar(256)) else cast(l1.text as varchar(256)) end as value_as_string, case when data2lkup = 'SUM' then a.data2 else null end as sm_units from Additional_upd a JOIN Entity e on a.enttype = e.code and e.data_fields >= 1 LEFT JOIN lookuptype lt1 on e.data1lkup = lt1.name LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l1 on cast(a.data1 as varchar) = cast(l1.code as varchar) and lt1.lookup_type_id = l1.lookup_type_id LEFT JOIN Medical m on cast(a.data1 as varchar(20)) = cast(m.medcode as varchar(20)) LEFT JOIN Product p on cast(a.data1 as varchar(20))=cast(p.prodcode as varchar(20)) where a.data1 is not null and enttype != 372
union all select a.patid, a.adid, cast(a.enttype as varchar(20)) + '-' + '2' as observation_source_value, case when l1.code is null and data2lkup is null then cast(a.data2 as varchar(256)) when data2lkup = 'GEN_SDC' and cast(a.data2 as varchar) not in ('0', '2', '3') then cast(dateadd(d,-cast(a.data2 as int)- 10 ,'12-31-2014') as varchar(256)) when data2lkup='Medical Dictionary' then cast(m.description as varchar(256)) when data2lkup='Product Dictionary' then cast(p.productname as varchar(256)) else cast(l1.text as varchar(256)) end as value_as_string, case when data3lkup = 'SUM' then a.data3 else null end as sm_units FROM Additional_upd a JOIN entity e on a.enttype = e.code and e.data_fields >= 2 LEFT JOIN lookuptype lt1 on e.data2lkup = lt1.name LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l1 on cast(a.data2 as varchar) = cast(l1.code as varchar) and lt1.lookup_type_id = l1.lookup_type_id LEFT JOIN Medical m on cast(a.data2 as varchar(20)) = cast(m.medcode as varchar(20)) LEFT JOIN Product p on cast(a.data2 as varchar(20)) = cast(p.prodcode as varchar(20)) where a.data2 is not null and enttype != 372 and (data2lkup is null or (data2lkup is not null and data2lkup != 'SUM'))
union all select a.patid, a.adid, cast(a.enttype as varchar(20)) + '-' + '3' as observation_source_value, case when l1.code is null and data3lkup is null then cast(a.data3 as varchar(256)) when data3lkup = 'GEN_SDC' and cast(a.data3 as varchar) not in ('0', '2', '3') then cast(dateadd(d,-cast(a.data3 as int)- 10 ,'12-31-2014') as varchar(256)) when data3lkup = 'Medical Dictionary' then cast(m.description as varchar(256)) when data3lkup = 'Product Dictionary' then cast(p.productname as varchar(256)) else cast(l1.text as varchar(256)) end as value_as_string, case when data4lkup = 'SUM' then a.data4 else null end as sm_units from Additional_upd a JOIN Entity e on a.enttype = e.code and e.data_fields >= 3 LEFT JOIN lookuptype lt1 on e.data3lkup = lt1.name LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l1 on cast(a.data3 as varchar) = cast(l1.code as varchar) and lt1.lookup_type_id = l1.lookup_type_id LEFT JOIN Medical m on cast(a.data3 as varchar(20)) = cast(m.medcode as varchar(20)) LEFT JOIN Product p on cast(a.data3 as varchar(20)) = cast(p.prodcode as varchar(20)) where a.data3 is not null and enttype != 372 and (data3lkup is null or (data3lkup is not null and data3lkup != 'SUM'))
union all select a.patid, a.adid, cast(a.enttype as varchar(20)) + '-' + '4' as observation_source_value, case when l1.code is null and data4lkup is null then cast(a.data4 as varchar(256)) when data4lkup = 'GEN_SDC' and cast(a.data4 as varchar) not in ('0', '2', '3') then cast(dateadd(d,-cast(a.data4 as int)- 10 ,'12-31-2014') as varchar(256)) when data4lkup = 'Medical Dictionary' then cast(m.description as varchar(256)) when data4lkup = 'Product Dictionary' then cast(p.productname as varchar(256)) else cast(l1.text as varchar(256)) end as value_as_string, case when data5lkup = 'SUM' then a.data5 else null end as sm_units from Additional_upd a JOIN Entity e on a.enttype = e.code and e.data_fields >= 4 LEFT JOIN lookuptype lt1 on e.data4lkup = lt1.name LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l1 on cast(a.data4 as varchar) = cast(l1.code as varchar) and lt1.lookup_type_id = l1.lookup_type_id LEFT JOIN Medical m on cast(a.data4 as varchar(20)) = cast(m.medcode as varchar(20)) LEFT JOIN Product p on cast(a.data4 as varchar(20)) = cast(p.prodcode as varchar(20)) where a.data4 is not null and enttype != 372 and (data4lkup is null or (data4lkup is not null and data4lkup != 'SUM'))
union all select a.patid, a.adid, cast(a.enttype as varchar(20)) + '-' + '5' as observation_source_value, case when l1.code is null and data5lkup is null then cast(a.data5 as varchar(256)) when data5lkup = 'GEN_SDC' and cast(a.data5 as varchar) not in ('0', '2', '3') then cast(dateadd(d,-cast(a.data5 as int)- 10 ,'12-31-2014') as varchar(256)) when data5lkup = 'Medical Dictionary' then cast(m.description as varchar(256)) when data5lkup = 'Product Dictionary' then cast(p.productname as varchar(256)) else cast(l1.text as varchar(256)) end as value_as_string, case when data6lkup = 'SUM' then a.data6 else null end as sm_units from Additional_upd a JOIN Entity e on a.enttype = e.code and e.data_fields >= 5 LEFT JOIN lookuptype lt1 on e.data5lkup = lt1.name LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l1 on cast(a.data5 as varchar) = cast(l1.code as varchar) and lt1.lookup_type_id = l1.lookup_type_id LEFT JOIN Medical m on cast(a.data5 as varchar(20)) = cast(m.medcode as varchar(20)) LEFT JOIN Product p on cast(a.data5 as varchar(20)) = cast(p.prodcode as varchar(20)) where a.data5 is not null and enttype != 372 and (data5lkup is null or (data5lkup is not null and data5lkup != 'SUM'))
union all select a.patid, a.adid, cast(a.enttype as varchar(20)) + '-' + '6' as observation_source_value, case when l1.code is null and data6lkup is null then cast(a.data6 as varchar(256)) when data6lkup = 'GEN_SDC' and cast(a.data6 as varchar) not in ('0', '2', '3') then cast(dateadd(d,-cast(a.data6 as int)- 10 ,'12-31-2014') as varchar(256)) when data6lkup = 'Medical Dictionary' then cast(m.description as varchar(256)) when data6lkup = 'Product Dictionary' then cast(p.productname as varchar(256)) else cast(l1.text as varchar(256)) end as value_as_string, case when data7lkup = 'SUM' then a.data7 else null end as sm_units from Additional_upd a JOIN Entity e on a.enttype = e.code and e.data_fields >= 6 LEFT JOIN lookuptype lt1 on e.data6lkup = lt1.name LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l1 on cast(a.data6 as varchar) = cast(l1.code as varchar) and lt1.lookup_type_id = l1.lookup_type_id LEFT JOIN Medical m on cast(a.data6 as varchar(20)) = cast(m.medcode as varchar(20)) LEFT JOIN Product p on cast(a.data6 as varchar(20)) = cast(p.prodcode as varchar(20)) where a.data6 is not null and enttype != 372 and (data6lkup is null or (data6lkup is not null and data6lkup != 'SUM'))
union all select a.patid, a.adid, cast(a.enttype as varchar(20)) + '-' + '7' as observation_source_value, case when l1.code is null and data7lkup is null then cast(a.data7 as varchar(256)) when data7lkup = 'GEN_SDC' and cast(a.data7 as varchar) not in ('0', '2', '3') then cast(dateadd(d,-cast(a.data7 as int)- 10 ,'12-31-2014') as varchar(256)) when data7lkup = 'Medical Dictionary' then cast(m.description as varchar(256)) when data7lkup = 'Product Dictionary' then cast(p.productname as varchar(256)) else cast(l1.text as varchar(256)) end as value_as_string, null as sm_units from Additional_upd a JOIN Entity e on a.enttype = e.code and e.data_fields >= 7 LEFT JOIN lookuptype lt1 on e.data7lkup = lt1.name LEFT JOIN [Lookup] l1 on cast(a.data7 as varchar) = cast(l1.code as varchar) and lt1.lookup_type_id = l1.lookup_type_id LEFT JOIN Medical m on cast(a.data7 as varchar(20)) = cast(m.medcode as varchar(20)) LEFT JOIN Product p on cast(a.data7 as varchar(20)) = cast(p.prodcode as varchar(20)) where a.data7 is not null and enttype != 372 and (data7lkup is null or (data7lkup is not null and data7lkup != 'SUM'))
union all select a.patid, a.adid, '372-' + cast(cast(a.data3 as int) as varchar(20)) + '-' + cast(cast(a.data2 as int) as varchar(20)) as observation_source_value, cast(a.data1 as varchar(20)) as value_as_string, null as sm_units from Additional_upd a where a.data1 is not null and a.enttype = 372
)
SELECT a.patid, a.observation_source_value, a.value_as_string, case when ISNUMERIC(a.value_as_string) = 1 then cast(a.value_as_string as float) else null end as value_as_number, b.eventdate, b.staffid, cast((cast(a.patid as bigint)*100000000)+(year(b.eventdate) *10000)+ (month(b.eventdate)*100)+ day(b.eventdate) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, case when value_as_string = 'Not examined' then 4301433 when value_as_string ='Potential Abnormal' then 40567538 when value_as_string = 'Present' then 4181412 when value_as_string= 'Unknown' then 4129922 when value_as_string= 'Normal' then 4069590 when value_as_string= 'Absent' then 4132135 when value_as_string= 'Abnormal' then 4135493 end as value_as_concept_id, c.text as units_source_value, a.sm_units FROM a JOIN Clinical b on a.adid = b.adid and RIGHT(a.patid,3) = RIGHT(b.patid,3) LEFT JOIN [Lookup] c on c.lookup_type_id = (SELECT [lookup_type_id] FROM [LookupType] WHERE name = 'SUM') and a.sm_units = c.code where b.eventdate is not null and a.value_as_string != 'Data Not Entered' and a.value_as_string is not null and a.value_as_string != ' '
